BBEX3.A.TRY.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Turkey / USD 1 = TRY ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion effective from 1 January 2005: 1,000,000 Turkish lira (TRL) = 1 New Turkish lira (TRY), designated as Turkish lira (TRY) since 1 January 2009.
Source: Central Bank of Turkey, Ankara.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of daily buying and selling rates.
